ComicInfo.Title: Adventures in Science; Confinement; I Live in the Bottomless Pit; An Authentic Innuit Folk Song; The Man Who Couldn't Stop; My Old Neighborhood; Garbage Day; Adventures in Science; Crime and Punishment; Joke Time [Why did the chicken cross the road?]

ComicInfo.Summary:
Some unnamed characters from previous stories interact and Ed escapes.
Ed is in prison.
A man on the run takes a flying leap.
Quin the hunter needs a pee.
That guy's on the toilet an awful long time.
Madge is taking out the garbage.
How to tell worms and pianos apart.
Chet loses his hand.
A bizarre take on a classic joke.
